price: Allah dedi ki: “Hayır, korkma! İkiniz ayetlerimizle gidin. Muhakkak biz sizinle birlikteyiz, işitenleriz.”
arabic: قَالَ كَلَّاۖ فَٱذۡهَبَا بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآۖ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسۡتَمِعُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla kallā fa-idh'habā biāyātinā innā maʿakum mus'tamiʿūna
